known_issues: Background music/audio is not audible or not playing correctly

existing_features.title: Remove all background music playback logic from the main page, including the HTMLAudioElement creation, play/pause handling, volume handling, and track-switching side effects.
Remove all music-related UI from the main page, including the header play/pause button and the "Music Controls" panel (track selection, volume slider, now-playing status, and attribution).
Remove the unused music track configuration dependency from the frontend by eliminating usage/imports of the track list used for background music.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove background music/audio from the app because it is not playing correctly
